attributes.action: Raise the speed limit for HGVs on the A96
attributes.additional_details: Lorries doing 40mph on a road with few place to pass and that is also the main artery between two cities is causing major frustration and anger. This subsequently causes people to take risks and cause accidents.
attributes.background: Change the speed limit from 40mph to 50mph for HGVs on the A96.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local roads are a matter for your local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could also submit a petition to your local authority at this link:
https://www.highland.gov.uk/info/670/consultations_complaints_and_compliments/622/consultations_and_petitions/2
